info.headline: Snow-ice Yellow Warning for Bosnia and Herzegovina - region Banja Luka
info.instruction: Be aware of snow and/or ice on roads and sidewalks. Local distraction in outdoor activities. Be careful when walking, cycling or driving due to slippery surfaces.
info.senderName: Republic Hydrometeorological Service of the Republic of Srpska

info.headline: Snijeg-led žuto Upozorenje za Bosnu i Hercegovinu - region Banja Luka
info.instruction: Budite svjesni rasprostranjenog snijega i/ili leda na saobraćajnicama i trotoarima. Lokalne smetenje u aktivnostima na otvorenom. Budite pažljivi kada hodate, vozite biciklo ili vozite automobil uslijed klizavih površina.
info.senderName: Republički hidrometeorološki zavod Republike Srpske

info.headline: Wind Yellow Warning for Bosnia and Herzegovina - region Trebinje
info.instruction: Be aware of the debris carried by the wind. Local disturbances in outdoor activities are possible due to debris carried by the wind.
info.senderName: Republic Hydrometeorological Service of the Republic of Srpska

info.headline: Vjetar žuto Upozorenje za Bosnu i Hercegovinu - region Trebinje
info.instruction: Budite svjesni krhotina koje nosi vjetar. Lokalne smetenje u aktivnostima na otvorenom su moguće usljed krhotina koje nosi vjetar.
info.senderName: Republički hidrometeorološki zavod Republike Srpske

info.headline: Snow-ice Yellow Warning for Bosnia and Herzegovina - region Prijedor
info.instruction: Be aware of snow and/or ice on roads and sidewalks. Local distraction in outdoor activities. Be careful when walking, cycling or driving due to slippery surfaces.
info.senderName: Republic Hydrometeorological Service of the Republic of Srpska

info.headline: Snijeg-led žuto Upozorenje za Bosnu i Hercegovinu - region Prijedor
info.instruction: Budite svjesni rasprostranjenog snijega i/ili leda na saobraćajnicama i trotoarima. Lokalne smetenje u aktivnostima na otvorenom. Budite pažljivi kada hodate, vozite biciklo ili vozite automobil uslijed klizavih površina.
info.senderName: Republički hidrometeorološki zavod Republike Srpske

info.headline: Snow-ice Yellow Warning for Bosnia and Herzegovina - region Bihac
info.instruction: Be aware of snow and/or ice on roads and sidewalks. Local distraction in outdoor activities. Be careful when walking, cycling or driving due to slippery surfaces.
info.senderName: Hydrometeorological Institute of Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina

info.headline: Snijeg-led žuto Upozorenje za Bosnu i Hercegovinu - region Bihac
info.instruction: Budite svjesni rasprostranjenog snijega i/ili leda na saobraćajnicama i trotoarima. Lokalne smetenje u aktivnostima na otvorenom. Budite pažljivi kada hodate, vozite biciklo ili vozite automobil uslijed klizavih površina.
info.senderName: Federalni hidrometeorološki zavod Federacije Bosne i Hercegovine

info.headline: Rain Yellow Warning for Bosnia and Herzegovina - region Bihac
info.instruction: Be aware of the possibility of local flooding of a small number of properties, with local disruption to outdoor activities. Difficult driving conditions due to reduced visibility and uncontrolled movement of vehicles due to water.
info.senderName: Hydrometeorological Institute of Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina

info.description: Očekivana količina padavina između 15 i 30 l/m2-
info.headline: Kiša žuto Upozorenje za Bosnu i Hercegovinu - region Bihac
info.instruction: Budite svjesni mogućnosti za lokalno plavljenje manjeg broja imovine, sa lokalnim ometanjem u aktivnostima na otvorenom. Teški uslovi za vožnju uslijed smanjenje vidljivosti i nekontrolisanog kretanja vozila uslijed vode.
info.senderName: Federalni hidrometeorološki zavod Federacije Bosne i Hercegovine

info.description: New snow between 5 and 10, in higer altitude up to 15 cm.

info.description: Visina novog sniježnog pokrivaća između 5 i 10, u višom područjima 15 cm.

info.headline: Low-temperature Yellow Warning for Bosnia and Herzegovina - region Livno
info.instruction: Be aware that low air temperatures are expected. There are possible health risks among the vulnerable population, for example, the elderly and very young people and the homeless.
info.senderName: Hydrometeorological Institute of Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina

info.headline: Niska temperatura žuto Upozorenje za Bosnu i Hercegovinu - region Livno
info.instruction: Budite svjesni da se očekuju niske temperature zraka. Mogući su zdravstveni rizici među ugroženom populacijom, na primjer, starije i veoma mlade osobe i beskućnici.
info.senderName: Federalni hidrometeorološki zavod Federacije Bosne i Hercegovine
